page.title: 16Description of Our Area
page.content:
** Description of Our Area **
The river{Esk}flows through this area which is wooded with small farms. Some of the farms are rented and either belong to the Lord of the Manor or to the Normanby Estate. The 3 villages are very small. {Grosmont}being a little larger than {Egton}and{Egton Bridge}as it was once an iron_mining village. This area is served by the Esk Valley Railway line and the children who attend Secondary School in Whitby travel by it. A Mobile Bank visits Egton twice a week for half an hour and Grosmont on another day.The Library van comes fortnightly to outlying farms and the villages.The baker,greengrocer and fish and chip vans visit us weekly.
